game.name: TEKO
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: TEKO is an Indie Roguelike Deckbuilder where you have to reach the highest possible score by playing Poker hands, but in an unconventional way: making 3 combos at once.
game.shortDescriptionEn: TEKO is an Indie Roguelike Deckbuilder where you have to reach the highest possible score by playing Poker hands, but in an unconventional way: making 3 combos at once.
